PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 2011-626 of June 21, 2011 concerning the appointment of SCOTT HALDANE to the position of special adviser to the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development, to be known as Chair of the National Panel on First Nation Elementary and Secondary Education.
